it.dc.bridge.om

Class CoAPResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.dc.bridge.om.CoAPResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoAPInterface, org.alljoyn.bus.BusObject

    public class CoAPResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoAPInterface, org.alljoyn.bus.BusObject
    The Class CoAPResource is an AllJoyn object representing the CoAP resource. It implements the CoAPInterface interface which offers the CoAP RESTful methods and the observing service methods.

    The class implements also the AllJoyn BusObject interface.

    In addition to the CoAPInterface methods, CoAPResource implements the following methods for the object path management:

    • getPath() returns the object path.
    • setPath(String) sets the object path.
    See Also:
    CoAPInterface
